zoiodelula.settings.attributesInNewlineT.markdownDescription:
Attributes count threshold to position attributes in newlines. Default is *1*. This setting only works when **Position first attribute on same line** is enabled.

For example if threshold=2, all attributes will be on same line if an element has only 2 attributes,

otherwise each attribute will be placed on newline.

More Info: [GitHub](https://github.com/AndersonPull/Zoio_de_lula_MAUI)

zoiodelula.settings.positionAllAttribute.markdownDescription:
Position all attributes on same line as element. Setting this to *Checked* will ignore *Position First Attribute On Same Line*=*Unchecked*. *Default* is *Unchecked.* 

 **Checked** : 

 `<Element Attribute1="Value1" Attribute2="Value2"` 

 **Unchecked** :

`<Element Attribute1="Value1"`

         `Attribute2="Value2"`

zoiodelula.settings.useSelfClosingTag.markdownDescription:
If no child nodes then use self closing tag `/>`. *Default* is *Checked* 

 **Checked** : `<label></label>` → `<label/>` 

  **Unchecked** : `<label></label>` → `<label></label>`
